title: Pterocarpus soyauxii (Fabaceae) aqueous extract to prevent neuropsychiatric disorders associated with menopause by triggering ROS-dependent oxidative damage and inhibiting acetylcholinesterase, GABA-transaminase, and monoamine oxidase A: In vitro, in vivo, and in silico approaches
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Pascal Emmanuel Owona, Yolande Sandrine Mengue Ngadena, Danielle Claude Bilanda, Madeleine Chantal Ngoungour√©, Lohik Mbolang Nguegan, Ronald Bidingha A Goufani, Rivaldo Bernes Kahou Tadah, Michel Noubom, Armand Fils Ella, Yannick Carlos Tcheutchoua, Bruno Dupon Ambamba Akamba, Paule Cynthia Bouguem Yandja, Paulin Keumedjio Teko, Paul Desire Dzeufiet Djomeni, Pierre Kamtchouing
